subtitle: Make the most of scallops when in season with this simply stunning starter.

method.text: Place the scallops, lime juice, oil and dill in a bowl. Toss together until well coated.
Using the back of a knife, stretch the bacon rashers slightly, then cut into short lengths. Wrap a bacon length around each scallop and thread onto bamboo skewers (allowing 2 skewers per person).
Place under grill for 6-8 min, turning frequently until bacon is crispy and scallops are cooked.
Meanwhile mix together the creme fraiche, garlic, salad onions and seasoning. Spoon mixture into a serving bowl.
Serve the skewered scallops immediately with the dip.

title: Skewered scallops with bacon
